name: Damnation City of Death
description: Damnation City of Death features survival gameplay, where you fight against monsters, cold, hunger, thirst and other players. The Gameplay is an action packed fight for survival, where you always need to be ready for the next encounter you face. You can also do various missions with friends.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP+ Processor: Dual core Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 512 MB, Graphics card with DX9 (shader model 2.0) DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 2000 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7+ Processor: Dual core Memory: 3 GB RAM Graphics: 512 MB, Graphics card with DX9 (shader model 2.0), Intel HD Graphics 4400 DirectX: Version 9.0c Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 2000 MB available space
